title: Capricorn

version.description:
Unicode 1.1 were pre-dated emoji inclusion in Unicode by 17 years, and included many characters primarily sourced from the Zapf Dingbats font.

The following characters were added to Unicode in 1993 and many were given emoji presentation status in the years 2010-2015.

emoji_net_data.definition: The Capricorn astrological sign in the Zodiac. This Zodiac Symbol represents a Goat. Capricorn was approved as part of Unicode 1.1 in 1993 a http://emojipedia.org/capricorn/
emoji_net_data.name: Capricorn

bn:00015707n: One of the constellations of the zodiac
A faint zodiacal constellation in the southern hemisphere; between Sagittarius and Aquarius
One of the twelve constellations of the zodiac.
Capricornus is one of the constellations of the zodiac; it is often called Capricorn, especially when referring to the corresponding astrological sign.
Capricorn is the tenth astrological sign in the zodiac, originating from the constellation of Capricornus.
